sentences.sContent: Both a staircase and a lift connect the two floors with an enclosed terrace on the roof.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both a staircase and a lift connect the two floors with an enclosed terrace on the roof.
sentences.sCn: 通过一道楼梯和一台电梯连接两层楼和封闭的屋顶平台。

sentences.sContent: Mirrored walls, skylights and large plated windows overlooking the garden and terrace fill this modern space with light.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mirrored walls, skylights and large plated windows overlooking the garden and terrace fill this modern space with light.
sentences.sCn: 镜墙、天窗和大型的金属镀窗俯瞰花园和阳台，让这个现代空间充满光线。

trans.tranOther: a flat outdoor area next to a building or on a roof, where you can sit outside to eat, relax etc
